response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This product is not just an item; it's an investment that promises to deliver exceptional value and efficiency. Given its unique features and capabilities, we believe it's worth far more than its face value. Considering its market value and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you to acquire this product at a special price of $15,000. This opportunity is tailored for individuals like you who appreciate premium quality and seek unparalleled experiences. I look forward to your positive response and the chance to discuss how this product can significantly enhance your operations or personal needs.", "product_price": 15000}
